typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		id as string,
		product as (name as string, modelName as string, manufactore as string)[],
		price as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false,
	documentForm: 'documentPerLine',
	unquotedColumnNames: true) ~> source1
